title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 456/2004 of 11 March 2004 amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain milk products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 456/2004
of 11 March 2004
amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain milk products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1255/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organisation of the markets in the milk and milk products sector(1), and in particular Article 31(3) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The rates of the refunds applicable from 27 February 2004 to the products listed in the Annex, exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty, were fixed by Commission Regulation (EC) No 340/2004(2).
(2) It follows from applying the rules and criteria contained in Regulation (EC) No 340/2004 to the information at present available to the Commission that the export refunds at present applicable should be altered as shown in the Annex hereto,
main_body: The rates of refund fixed by Regulation (EC) No 340/2004 are hereby altered as shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 12 March 2004.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 March 2004.
For the Commission
Erkki Liikanen
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 160, 26.6.1999, p. 48. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1787/2003 (OJ L 270, 21.10.2003, p. 121).
(2) OJ L 60, 27.2.2004, p. 4.
ANNEX
Rates of the refunds applicable from 12 March 2004 to certain milk products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
